entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
